nodes.text: The Anorelga system was a star system that was located in the northern part of the Braxant sector, within the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. It fell within the borders of the Pentastar Alignment between the years 4 ABY and 12 ABY, and was a part of the Imperial Remnant between 18 ABY and 35 ABY. The system was the origin point of the Anorelgan slip-socker, an item that was being sold during the Galactic Civil War on the luxury liner Kuari Princess.
The Anorelga system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-3.
